meanings.sent1: The trilobal leaf had three distinct sections.
meanings.sent2: The trilobal rock formation was fascinating to study.
meanings.sent3: The trilobal cake was cut into three equal parts for sharing.
meanings.sent4: Her trilobal mind could see things from multiple perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The trilobal key opened three different locks.

meanings.definition: A trilobal fiber or yarn with three lobes or projections.
meanings.sent1: She used trilobal yarn to knit a cozy sweater.
meanings.sent2: The trilobal fiber added texture to the fabric.
meanings.sent3: The trilobal thread tangled easily in the sewing machine.
meanings.sent4: The trilobal material shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The trilobal yarn created a unique pattern in the design.
